translation.en: So what do you think, Joe?
I don’t know.
I don’t think that’s for me to say.
A second chance?
I mean, it’s a nice idea, but...
But?
- How do you feel? - Feel?
I feel that I was a nightmare.
I made terrible choices.
I drove my family away. I--
I hurt people.
I didn’t mean to, but there it is.
translation.es: No era mi intención, pero ahí está.

translation.en: And for all that...
there’s a hole inside me now.
translation.es: ...ahora hay un agujero dentro de mí.

translation.en: It hurts. I carry it.
Like Phil Coakley hurts?
Of course not.
But I know the work I’ve done. You’ve seen that.
translation.es: Pero sé el trabajo que hice. Lo viste.

translation.en: Yeah.
- Yeah. I have. - Right.
I got almost six years.
That’s real.
That’s clarity.
I can’t do anything about before. That’s done.
translation.es: No puedo hacer nada por lo que hice.

translation.en: But I can show people I’ve changed.
Like with my behavior.
And my girls.
I can be their father again.
translation.es: Puedo ser su padre otra vez.

translation.en: And that’s what you want?
That’s all there is.
A second chance.
Why not?
I have faith in you, Joe.
- Thank you, Morris. -
Let’s go.
Would you like to take communion before you go?
Oh, no. I’m good.
Yeah.
- Keep the change. - Thanks.
Mother’s got her soup line today late.
translation.es: Mamá ayuda en el comedor popular hoy, tarde.

translation.en: I think we expected to see you next week.
- Ah, she’d have meant to be here. - It’s okay.
translation.es: - Ella quería estar aquí. - Está bien.

translation.en: Well, she’d have meant to be here.
- Wait. Here. -
Retired, huh?
Yeah. I couldn’t hump the lines anymore.
translation.es: Sí. Ya no podía seguir haciendo esa tarea.

translation.en: Look, uh, you know, such a long trip up there
translation.es: Escucha, ya sabes, era un viaje largo hasta allá,

translation.en: and my back being what it is.
- I know. - Still, we should have.
translation.es: - Lo sé. - Aun así, deberíamos haber ido.

translation.en: - I just, uh-- - I know.
They brought some of your stuff back when they closed your apartment.
translation.es: Trajeron algunas cosas de tu apartamento.

translation.en: It’s downstairs in your space if you wanna--
translation.es: Están abajo en tu espacio si quieres...

translation.en: Sure.
Hey, baby.
I missed you too.
The number you’ve reached is not in service--
- Where’d they move to? - We don’t know.
We haven’t spoken to Elaine since you went up.
translation.es: No hablamos con Elaine desde que te encerraron.

translation.en: What about the girls? Birthdays? Christmas?
We are not in touch anymore.
- You never called? - She wouldn’t accept ’em.
Well, she’s not obligated to.
The settlement was clear--
Whoa, whoa, whoa. I contested that fucking settlement.
A clean break now, Joe, while the girls are young.
translation.es: Borrón y cuenta nueva, Joe, mientras ellas son pequeñas.

translation.en: It’s a shame, but maybe she’s right.
translation.es: Es una pena, pero quizá tenga razón.

translation.en: Can I borrow the truck?
- Your mother will be home-- - Dad.
I’ve been indoors six years. Please.
translation.es: Estuve encerrado seis años. Por favor.

translation.en: Hello?
Melissa?
Yeah?
It’s Daddy, sweetie.
It’s your dad.
My dad? Uh- huh.
How are you, baby?
Hmm. Good.
How’s your sister?
She’s okay.
That’s great.
Um, you know, I--
I’ve been away because... Well, I had to be away.
translation.es: Estuve lejos porque... Bueno, debía estar lejos.

translation.en: It wasn’t my fault.
Well, it was, but I was sick and...
translation.es: Bueno, lo fue, pero estaba enfermo y...

translation.en: But now-- now I’m better, see, and we--
translation.es: Pero ahora... Ahora estoy mejor y nosotros...

translation.en: Can you hold on?
Melissa. Melissa, wait. Wait. I love you.
Joe?
Hey, sweetie.
How did you get this number?
I know. I just wanted to talk to the girls.
translation.es: Lo sé. Solo quería hablar con las niñas.

translation.en: Joe, you know that’s not allowed.
translation.es: Joe, sabes que no está permitido.

translation.en: - I should be able to speak to my-- - Listen to me.
You’re violating your agreement.
Agreement?
- You call again... - Why are you--
...I’ll press charges.
Well, this is--
Joe’s such a bad boy.
translation.es: Joe es un chico muy malo.

translation.en: - Sucker. - Sorry. Sorry.
Joe motherfuckin’ Denton.
- Shit. Scotty. Look at you. - Look at you.
translation.es: - Mierda. Scotty. Mírate. - Mírate a ti.

translation.en: Goddamn. It’s good to see you.
Uh, get one, and put that on mine.
translation.es: Dame uno y pon el suyo en mi cuenta.

translation.en: - That’s kind of you, man. Cheers. - Oh, it’s the least I can do.
translation.es: - Qué amable. Salud. - Es lo menos que puedo hacer.

translation.en: It’s the least I can do, man.
translation.es: Es lo menos que puedo hacer.

translation.en: I figure you and Billy were-- you were like brothers,
translation.es: Supongo que Billy y tú... ...eran como hermanos y eso nos hace hermanos...

translation.en: so that makes us like brothers, so...
translation.es: ...eran como hermanos y eso nos hace hermanos...

translation.en: - Hey. - To bein’ home.
And to my brother Billy.
To home and to Billy.
I-- I just-- I wanted to say hey, welcome you back.
translation.es: Yo... solo quería saludarte, darte la bienvenida.

translation.en: If you need anything...
- Thanks, man. Good to see ya. - Give me a call.
You know, I come in here a lot,
and I’m pretty sure I’ve never seen you before.
translation.es: y estoy segura de que nunca te había visto.

translation.en: I’m new.
- New used, maybe. - Mm- hmm.
But it’s what’s under the hood that counts.
translation.es: Lo que cuenta está bajo el capó.

translation.en: - Yep. - Right?
Not the paint job. The ride is just so--
translation.es: No en la pintura. - El andar es tan... - Entiendo. Autos.

translation.en: I get it. Cars.
translation.es: - El andar es tan... - Entiendo. Autos.

translation.en: Enjoyable.
Do you, uh...
wanna buy me a Sucker Punch?
Oh, boy.
I don’t know what that is.
Drinks.
Hey!
Hey.
- Now what? -
No. No.
No, I, uh-- I gotta go home.
translation.es: No, yo... Debo ir a casa.

translation.en: - - Yeah. Are you sure?
Yeah.
That’s boring. Wanna give me a ride home at least?
translation.es: Qué aburrido. ¿Al menos me llevas a mi casa?

translation.en: Please.
Pretty please?
Pretty, pretty please?
You sure this is the right way?
Yeah. It’s, uh, straight down there.
It’s right over there.
Okay.
You know...
...I thought you were gonna try something with me.
- I’m just giving you a lift. - Hmm.
You didn’t ask my name.
What’s your name?
- - Cara.
Cara Coakley, you motherfucker.
Help! Somebody help me!
Coffee?
I’d say it’s good to see you again, but I feel sick just being this close.
translation.es: Diría que es un gusto volver a verte, pero siento náuseas.

translation.en: - Nice to see you too, Dan. - Lieutenant Pleasant.
translation.es: - Qué gusto verte, Dan. - Teniente Pleasant.

translation.en: Don’t you dare use the informal with me, you fucking degenerate.
translation.es: No te atrevas a hablarme informalmente, degenerado.

translation.en: You’re an everlasting disgrace to this department, and if Officer Barnett wasn’t here,
translation.es: Eres una desgracia para nosotros, y si no estuviera el oficial Barnett ahí,

translation.en: I would tune you up myself on general principle.
translation.es: te golpearía yo mismo, solo por principio.

translation.en: Let me ask you something.
Did Manny Vassey or any of his animals visit you inside?
translation.es: ¿Manny Vassey o alguno de sus amigotes te visitó allá?

translation.en: Was it worth it, selling your soul to them?
You Judas fuck.
Where’s the DA?
Isn’t he coming?
Look, Phil, this is not how I want--
translation.es: Mira, Phil, no es así como quiero...

translation.en: One of those young men is in intensive care.
translation.es: Uno de ellos está en terapia intensiva.

translation.en: The one with the nunchakus?
His father is an alderman.
I don’t give a shit if they’re astronauts.
translation.es: Me importa un bledo si son astronautas.

translation.en: Charge me.
Put those assholes on the stand and watch ’em come apart like wet bread,
translation.es: Pon a esos imbéciles en el estrado y míralos desmoronarse como pan mojado

translation.en: because you know exactly what this is.
translation.es: porque sabes muy bien qué es esto.

translation.en: They’re parked in the middle of nowhere with ninja weapons,
translation.es: ¿Estaban en medio de la nada con armas ninja,

translation.en: precisely where and when their girlfriend happens to get assaulted?
translation.es: justo en el momento y el lugar donde atacan a su amiga?

translation.en: Come on. Be serious.
Now, your daughter built herself a cute little frame,
translation.es: Ahora, tu hija armó una bonita versión de la historia,

translation.en: but there’s no way this ends in anything but a civil suit
translation.es: pero esto no será más que una demanda civil

translation.en: that buys me your fucking house.
translation.es: que me permitirá comprar tu casa.

translation.en: You’re right.
I spoke with Cara just now.
She’s, uh, quite shaken by what happened.
translation.es: Está bastante perturbada por lo que pasó.

translation.en: She’s been, uh, angry lately.
She, uh...
Do you wish to press charges?
In light of the statement given by my--
translation.es: A la luz de la declaración de mi...

translation.en: Cara,
regarding the events of this evening...
translation.es: sobre los sucesos de esta noche,

translation.en: you have the right to press criminal battery charges against the men who attacked you,
translation.es: puedes presentar cargos por agresión contra los hombres que te atacaron...

translation.en: - and my office will issue arrest warrants. - Hmm.
translation.es: ...y mi oficina emitirá órdenes de arresto.

translation.en: Ah, forget it. It’s in the past.
Phil.
If I could change what happened, I would.
translation.es: Si pudiera cambiar lo que pasó, lo haría.

translation.en: But I paid my time.
I just want everything to stay in the past.
translation.es: Quiero que todo quede en el pasado.

translation.en: Like you want Billy Caldwell to stay in the past?
translation.es: ¿Y que Billy Caldwell se quede en el pasado?

translation.en: You’re batting zero, shithead.
Goddamn, I miss high school.
translation.es: Rayos, echo de menos la secundaria.

translation.en: I just passed a kid in the lot molesting his girlfriend
translation.es: Había un chico estacionado abusando de su novia

translation.en: in the backseat of his ’82 Datsun.
translation.es: en el asiento trasero de su Datsun.

translation.en: Kind of impressed that Phil’s kid went for hard stuff like that.
translation.es: Me impresionó lo que hizo la hija de Phil.

translation.en: She always seemed like kind of a flake to me.
translation.es: Siempre me pareció un poco rara.

translation.en: But then the mother did leave after the, uh--
translation.es: Pero, bueno, la madre se fue después de...

translation.en: So that’s gotta be kind of rough.
translation.es: Así que eso debe ser duro.

translation.en: You look like you lost a little weight. Usually all that starchy food they--
translation.es: Parece que perdiste un poco de peso. - Toda esa comida con fécula... - ¿Qué pasa, Dan?

translation.en: What’s up, Dan?
translation.es: - Toda esa comida con fécula... - ¿Qué pasa, Dan?

translation.en: How’s that for manners after all I’ve done for you?
translation.es: ¿Y tus modales, con lo que hice por ti?

translation.en: - - Hey.
Six years in county beats 12 years in the state house.
translation.es: Seis años en la del condado es mejor que 12 años en la estatal.

translation.en: Those boys down there would’ve spread you out like my crazy aunt’s quilt.
translation.es: Esos muchachos te habrían aplastado como a una colcha.

translation.en: Yeah, that was Manny’s grease, not yours.
translation.es: Sí, por el soborno de Manny, no el tuyo.

translation.en: - Speaking of the king... -
- I didn’t ask for this. - So give it back.
translation.es: Yo no pedí esto. Entonces devuélvelo.

translation.en: You heard about Manny?
What?
Cancer.
In the butt. Matter of time now.
translation.es: En el trasero. Le queda poco.

translation.en: Well, he had a good run. Junior can steer things now.
translation.es: Tuvo una buena vida. Júnior puede manejar todo.

translation.en: Nothin’ to do with me.
- Clean slate, huh? - Oh, yeah.
Well, I hate to break it to you, but you’re on the hook here, Joey.
translation.es: Detesto decirte esto, pero estás en aprietos, Joey.

translation.en: Manny’s gotta go.
You--
You said cancer.
Before then. Now. Yesterday.
Fuck are you talking about?
That old- time religion.
Old man’s found God.
Cravin’ salvation by way of confession.
Bullshit. He’d never flip.
Old Manny wouldn’t, but dying’s made him smaller.
translation.es: El Manny de antes no lo haría, pero morirse lo ha cambiado.

translation.en: So let’s consider now specifically the kinds of things that he might confess to.
translation.es: Así que consideremos la clase de cosas que podría confesar.

translation.en: Say, vis- à- vis, you.
Yeah. Now you’re seein’ it.
You think Phil’s comment about Bill Caldwell was coincidental?
translation.es: ¿Crees que lo que dijo Phil fue casualidad?

translation.en: - Manny’s talking to Phil? - Crazy, right?
First he wants Phil hit, then his asshole’s melting and he wants to give him absolution.
translation.es: Primero, quería muerto a Phil y ahora que agoniza, quiere darle la absolución.

translation.en: Christ forgives. The sinner is saved. All of that.
translation.es: Jesús perdona. El pecador se salva. Todo eso.

translation.en: Phil’s nudging him towards a deposition, and if he lives long enough, a grand jury.
translation.es: Phil lo alienta a que declare, y si vive lo suficiente, a un gran jurado.

translation.en: But even if not, you’d be inside so fast, your bunk would still be warm.
translation.es: Te encerrarán tan rápido que tu litera aún estará tibia.

translation.en: And no favors this time.
translation.es: Y no habrá favores esta vez.

translation.en: What do we do?
“We”? You got a turd in your pocket?
You know, Phil’s been trying to butt- fuck you since forever,
and if Manny sings, he can do it.
And if you do get keistered, I’d worry I’m next in line, and let me tell you what ain’t gonna happen.
translation.es: Y si te jode, yo soy el que sigue, y te advierto que eso no sucederá.

translation.en: If I was gonna roll over,
wouldn’t I do that before serving my fucking time?
translation.es: ¿no lo habría hecho antes de cumplir mi condena?

translation.en: - I did the job they wanted-- - No, half the job. Semantics.
translation.es: - Hice lo que pidieron... - No, la mitad. Semántica.

translation.en: - Fuck you. I took the fall. -
translation.es: Vete a la mierda. Asumí la culpa.

translation.en: You be sure and send her some flowers now, son.
The point is, you left Phil breathing all those years ago,
translation.es: El tema es que dejaste a Phil vivo estos años,

translation.en: or it wouldn’t be a problem now.
The way I see it, it’s your mess.
But hey, I’m more into carrots than sticks, so...
translation.es: Pero yo prefiero las zanahorias al palo.

translation.en: let’s talk about your girls instead.
translation.es: Así que hablemos de tus hijas.

translation.en: Junior high by now, hmm?
Family court judge by the name of Winthrop
translation.es: Un juez de familia llamado Winthrop

translation.en: found himself “over- served” one evening a while back.
And he dented up the front of his Prius with the skull of an address- free citizen.
translation.es: Y abolló el frente de su Prius con el cráneo de un hombre sin dirección.

translation.en: You might say I helped him sweep that up.
translation.es: Se podría decir que lo ayudé.

translation.en: And I know that he would fall all over himself doing me a favor in return.
translation.es: Y sé que estaría muy entusiasmado por devolverme el favor.

translation.en: Like revising your custody deal, for instance,
translation.es: Como revisar tu acuerdo por la tenencia,

translation.en: so you can see your daughters again.
translation.es: para que veas a tus hijas.

translation.en: What am I thinking? I gotta drive.
Manny goes. You get your girls back. That’s the carrot.
translation.es: Manny se va. Las recuperas. Esa es la zanahoria.

translation.en: The stick? Who wants to think about that?
Do it fast.
Answer me on that if I call.
- Don’t make me come after you. -
translation.es: No me hagas ir por ti.

translation.en: He lives.
Hi, Mom.
Oh, I guess you needed the rest. That’s okay.
translation.es: Supongo que necesitabas descansar. Eso está bien.

translation.en: - Is that a bruise? - Oh, no.
That was there already. From a door.
translation.es: Ya lo tenía. Por una puerta.

translation.en: - You need a hand? - Nah. Makin’ soup.
Hard time sleeping.
- Well, this is a big adjustment. - Mmm.
translation.es: Bueno, este es un gran cambio.

translation.en: Give it time.
I’m sorry I wasn’t here when you arrived. I--
translation.es: Lamento no haber estado cuando llegaste. Yo...

translation.en: - I, uh-- I already told him. - It’s okay. It’s okay.
translation.es: Yo... ya se lo dije. No importa.

translation.en: - Got our wires crossed, I guess. - Hmm.
translation.es: Se nos cruzaron los cables, supongo.

translation.en: - What are your-- - Dad says--
- Sorry. Go ahead. - No, no, you first.
I was just wondering what are your plans for work.
translation.es: Me preguntaba qué planes tienes para trabajar.

translation.en: I haven’t been home a day yet.
translation.es: No hace ni un día que llegué.

translation.en: It’s a reasonable question.
Your first night home and you’re out till dawn
translation.es: La primera noche, saliste hasta el amanecer

translation.en: with your father’s truck.
I just don’t want things going back to how they were.
translation.es: No quiero que las cosas vuelvan a ser como antes.

translation.en: Not here.
Dad says you don’t speak to your grandchildren.
translation.es: Papá dice que no hablan con sus nietas.

translation.en: That’s Elaine’s decision.
We just want what’s best for them.
translation.es: Solo queremos lo mejor para ellas.

translation.en: What about me?
It’s impossible to you that I might have changed?
translation.es: ¿Te parece imposible que yo haya cambiado?

translation.en: You know...
every Sunday in church...
translation.es: Todos los domingos, en la iglesia...

translation.en: I have to see Phil Coakley.
And everybody there sees me seeing him.
translation.es: Y todos me ven cuando lo veo.

translation.en: Have you ever thought what that might feel like... to me?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez pensaste cómo se siente eso? ¿Cómo me siento yo?

translation.en: Have you changed?
You know what this is?
You expect me to be impressed ’cause you didn’t drink in jail?
translation.es: ¿Esperas que me impresione que no bebieras ahí?

translation.en: Dad! Come on!
Look, see, this is complicated.
No, it’s not.
You say you’ve changed. Good. I hope it’s true.
translation.es: Dices que cambiaste. Bien. Espero que así sea.

translation.en: I’ve prayed for it long enough.
translation.es: Recé por eso por bastante tiempo.

translation.en: I’m happy you’re home, and I love you,
translation.es: Me alegra que estés en casa y te quiero...

translation.en: but you don’t get extra points for doing what’s simply required,
translation.es: ...pero no recibes puntos extra por hacer lo que hace falta,

translation.en: what everybody else does.
- I can’t believe this shit. - You have work to do, Joe!
translation.es: - No puedo creerlo. - ¡Tienes trabajo por hacer!

translation.en: I am profoundly sorry, Phil.
Bill Caldwell. Billy was my friend.
translation.es: Bill Caldwell. Billy era mi amigo.

translation.en: And I just wish he’d-- he’d...
worked the steps.
Hi, Phil.
I was out of line, the way I spoke to you last night.
translation.es: Estuvo fuera de lugar la forma en que te hablé anoche.

translation.en: I thought about this a lot,
what I wanted to say to you when I finally saw you,
translation.es: en lo que quería decirte cuando te viera...

translation.en: and that wasn’t it.
What I did wanna say was that I am profoundly sorry.
translation.es: Lo que quería decir es que lo lamento profundamente.

translation.en: I was truly in fear for my life.
I felt I was defending myself,
but that doesn’t excuse the--
I don’t even remember it. Insane.
translation.es: Ni siquiera lo recuerdo. Es una locura.

translation.en: - Which is it? - Which?
You were in fear for your life or you don’t remember.
translation.es: ¿Temías por tu vida o no lo recuerdas?

translation.en: Which is it?
The point is, I do take responsibility,
translation.es: Lo que quiero decir es que asumo la responsabilidad...

translation.en: and I’m ready to move ahead with a-- with a clean life, a good life.
translation.es: ...y estoy listo para seguir adelante con... con una vida sana, una buena vida.

translation.en: Take responsibility and just--
You know. Amends.
You mentioned Bill Caldwell.
He was my friend. I loved him.
translation.es: Era mi amigo. Yo lo quería.

translation.en: I just wish he’d gotten into the program like I have,
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera entrado al programa como yo,

translation.en: worked the steps.
There’s a whole other world you can live in.
translation.es: Se puede vivir en otro mundo.

translation.en: He just didn’t know.
You are within 100 yards of my home here.
translation.es: Estás a menos de 100 metros de mi casa.

translation.en: But I’m not interested in some chickenshit restraining order violation.
translation.es: Pero no me interesa una violación a una orden inhibitoria.

translation.en: For you, I want the needle.
translation.es: Para ti, quiero la inyección letal.

translation.en: - And I’m gonna get it. - Okay.
Okay.
“Anger eats the vessel.”
I guess you heard, huh?
How’s he doing?
Can I, um-- ?
He took care of me in there.
Hey, Manny.
You’re on the same drugs as me.
translation.es: Consumes las mismas drogas que yo.

translation.en: - How you feeling? - Eh.
I’m working on my anger.
- What? - Oh, nothing.
That’s not something I thought I’d ever hear you say.
translation.es: Es algo que creí que nunca te escucharía decir.

translation.en: What’d it ever get me?
All this. Lots of things.
Yeah, well, I don’t want ’em anymore.
Dan gave me a bag.
- You did your bid. - Yeah.
But I blew the job.
And I warned you about the drinking and the drugs.
translation.es: Y te advertí sobre el alcohol y las drogas.

translation.en: You did.
I should’ve listened, but since I didn’t...
translation.es: Debería haberte escuchado, pero como no lo hice...

translation.en: I guess I was expecting someone to clip me in there,
translation.es: Esperaba que alguien me matara ahí adentro,

translation.en: - not pay me when I came out. -
translation.es: no que me pagaran cuando saliera.

translation.en: If you knew how much it cost
to sell that imperfect self- defense line.
translation.es: vender ese argumento imperfecto de autodefensa.

translation.en: Manny, come on.
Yeah, I admit.
I was angry about Phil.
translation.es: Estaba enojado por lo de Phil.

translation.en: You blew our clean shot at him. Hmm.
But since you’d already taken care of Billy...
translation.es: Pero como ya te habías encargado de Billy...

translation.en: even though he went over to them...
he was your boy.
So that meant something.
I bet Junior disagreed, huh?
Yeah, well, Junior has a lot of--
a lot of different ideas about a lot of things.
Funny you mention talking to Phil.
translation.es: Qué curioso que hablaras con Phil.

translation.en: - Give me that fuckin’ thing. I hurt. - In a sec.
translation.es: - Dame esa cosa. Me duele. - En un segundo.

translation.en: Because what I hear,
there’s this notion floating now that maybe Billy wasn’t an accident.
translation.es: hay un rumor de que lo de Billy no fue un accidente.

translation.en: - There’s always talk. - Manny.
Are you talking to the DA? Huh?
You know, sometimes when I’m sleeping...
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? A veces, cuando estoy durmiendo...

translation.en: I think I see what hell looks like...
translation.es: ...creo que veo cómo es el infierno...

translation.en: and it ain’t fire and it ain’t devils.
translation.es: ...y no hay fuego y no hay diablos.

translation.en: You know what it is?
It’s just me.
And I ain’t no goddamn stool pigeon.
translation.es: Y yo no soy un maldito informante.

translation.en: I’m sorry.
I don’t know. I...
It’s been a tough few days, is all.
Tough, yeah.
Tough for everybody.
He nodded out. Pressed the thing there and just...
translation.es: Se durmió. Presionó esa cosa y...

translation.en: It’s the pain. We upped the dosage.

translation.en: We should probably let him rest.
Of course. Of course.
I’m Joe.
Charlotte Boyd.
Old friend.
So how is he-- I mean, it’s bad, huh?
I’m a hospice worker.
Yeah, well, he’s a fighter.
Charlotte?
Thank you for taking care of my friend.

translation.en: You’re gonna sit there with your stupid fuckin’ shirt and tell me I can’t see my own father?

translation.en: My kids can’t go?
He just wants you to call first, Junior, that’s all.

translation.en: Oh, I see.
Did this cocksucker call first?
Hey, Junior.
- I thought we were gonna see Poppy. - Wow.

translation.en: Go inside and play the quiet game, okay?

translation.en: Oh, man. You guys are so big.
Hey, close that door behind you. The A/C’s on, all right?

translation.en: - Goddamn, they grow so fast. - Yeah, how you doin’, Joe?
Now, you lay there with your hands on your scrotum and you listen.

translation.en: You are not welcome here.
This is a family time,
and this family no longer has any use for dumb- fuck, grief- causing policemen.

translation.en: Now, you come around here again bothering my father,

translation.en: disturbing his rest...
and I’m gonna bring you down to my playroom.
Yeah. You know what happens there.
translation.es: Sí. Ya sabes lo que sucede ahí.

translation.en: - All right. Come on. Let’s get up. -
I think we’d all feel better if you moved on.

Any idea what Phil Coakley talks to your dad about?

translation.en: Besides the Bible, I mean.
Now, why would you say something like that?
I mean, all these years my father carries your crazy ass,
translation.es: Es decir, mi padre te ayudó todos estos años,

translation.en: you’re implying he’s some kind of rat or something?
translation.es: Es decir, mi padre te ayudó todos estos años, ¿insinúas que es un delator?

translation.en: All right. Yo, break this motherfucker’s mouth.

translation.en: Hi.
Uh, can I have a coffee, please?
Thank you.
Hello.
Oh, hi.
Here.
Thank you.
No, thank you for taking care of my friend.
translation.es: No, gracias por cuidar a mi amigo.

translation.en: You said that already.
Are you from Bradley originally?
I moved from Montreal around two years ago.
translation.es: Vine de Montreal hace unos dos años.

translation.en: - You got family? - No.
I-- Well, uh, no.
Do you work there every day at Manny’s house?
translation.es: ¿Trabajas todos los días en lo de Manny?

translation.en: - Six days a week usually. - Hmm. Wow.
translation.es: Seis días a la semana. Vaya.

translation.en: And all of his-- I don’t know--
uh, medication and monitoring and all that, that’s all you?
translation.es: Y toda su... No sé... La medicación, el monitoreo, ¿lo haces tú?

translation.en: That’s me.
And another girl. We do split shifts.
Wow. That must feel like a big responsibility.
translation.es: Vaya. Debe ser una gran responsabilidad.

translation.en: I guess it is. I don’t feel overwhelmed.
translation.es: Supongo que sí. No me siento abrumada.

translation.en: No?
But I’m good at helping people.
translation.es: Pero soy buena ayudando a la gente.

translation.en: I guess your agency provides you
translation.es: Supongo que tu agencia te provee

translation.en: with supplies and medication and whatnot for there at the house.
translation.es: Supongo que tu agencia te provee suministros, medicación y demás para la casa.

translation.en: My father had lymphoma.
And...
They had him on so much different stuff there.
At the end...
he didn’t know what day it was.
- I’m sorry. It’s a terrible disease. - Yeah.
Actually, I just moved back here myself.
Everyone’s gone now.
I was, uh, doing some consulting--
Oh!
- What the fuck? - Sergeant Thom Doyle,
retired, IUPA local.
And you, sir, are a worthless goddamn punk.
translation.es: Y usted, señor, es un maldito matón despreciable.

translation.en: I think I’m gonna skip this one.
Do you think you might wanna get together again?

translation.en: Like I said, everyone’s gone now, and...
translation.es: Como dije, no queda nadie y...

translation.en: I like you.
You know, if you want, I could set you up with Toni.

You know we take care of cops here.
Bring that pussy over here, girl. Yeah.

translation.en: Come on. Come on. What’s wrong? Hey!
Bruno. Fuck. Get that fucker out of here.
All right, come on.
Get the fuck out.
- Who’s the peacock? - It’s her old man.
translation.es: - ¿Y el tipo llamativo? - Es su padre.

translation.en: Anyway, if you wanna spend some time with Toni, it’s on me.

translation.en: - Pass. - Suit yourself.
Hey, you want any, uh-- ?
Oh, no, thanks.
Oh, yeah.
Yeah.
Marion Barry tonight delegated many of his duties
translation.es: Marion Barry delegó muchas de sus tareas

translation.en: as mayor of the nation’s capital but did not resign.
translation.es: como alcalde de la capital de la nación, pero no renunció.

after the DC mayor was brought before a federal magistrate--
translation.es: tras ser llevado ante un magistrado federal...

translation.en: Excuse me.
That is not your vehicle.
Oh, Dad-- Dad said it was fine.
Where have you been all day? And why are you rushing in like this?
translation.es: ¿Dónde estuviste? ¿Y por qué entras como una tromba?

translation.en: For your information, I went to a meeting.
translation.es: Para que sepas, fui a una reunión.

translation.en: - Where? - What?
Where was the meeting you were at?
I-- It’s anonymous, Mom.
We’re not gonna do things like this. I’m telling you right now.
translation.es: No haremos las cosas así. Te lo digo ya mismo.

translation.en: - I’m doing everything I can! - All right, okay.
I wish I could believe you, Joe, but you make it so hard.
translation.es: Desearía poder creerte, Joe, pero lo haces difícil.

translation.en: No. You make it so hard, because you don’t want to believe in me.
translation.es: No. Tú lo haces difícil, porque no quieres creer en mí.

translation.en: I said “believe,” not “believe in.”
- See? - Now, listen.
The onus is on you.
What difference does it make when you’re determined to judge me?
translation.es: Tú debes probarlo. ¿Qué diferencia hay si me juzgas?

translation.en: Could I have some support here, please?
Oh, no, wait, wait. Mom.
Fuck it. I’ll be gone soon anyway.
What’s that supposed to mean?
This behavior is precisely why you lost your family, Joseph!

translation.en: - Would you like another one? - No, thanks.
What?
Thank you.
For asking me here.
I don’t usually-- And...
Feels nice.
Like I said, I like you.
Me too.
So, Montreal.
What prompted the move south?
Polarity.
Weather systems.
- Why does anyone do anything? - I don’t know.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué uno hace cosas? - No lo sé.

translation.en: Do you ever feel like you’re living in the wrong skin?
translation.es: ¿Nunca sientes que estás en otro cuerpo?

translation.en: Sometimes I’ll wake up in the middle of the night
translation.es: A veces me despierto por la noche

translation.en: and I’ll go to get a glass of water,
translation.es: A veces me despierto por la noche y voy a buscar un vaso con agua,

translation.en: and I’ll just catch myself in the mirror, and I don’t recognize myself at all.
translation.es: y cuando me veo en el espejo, no me reconozco para nada.

translation.es: Es como si otra persona estuviera ahí parada en mi baño.

Sure.
- - Do you-- ?
Oh, yeah.
I--  I’m just gonna go...
Do you-- Do you want a drink or something?
Okay. And you?
Yes.
Just... Okay.
I like your place.
It’s what I have.
- Cheers. -
Why me?
’Cause you’re good.
I think everything happens for a reason, you know?
translation.es: Creo que todo sucede por un motivo.

translation.en: Like what?
Meeting you.
- - No, really. I--
I’ve been having kind of a hard time.
Just alone, you know?
Things... just f- feel different now.

translation.en: - Hmm. - Hope that’s not weird to say.
translation.es: Espero que no sea raro que lo diga.

translation.en: Anyways, so, yeah.
Do you have any other clients?
Other than Manny, I mean.
I noticed you had, I don’t know, looked like, uh... - - ...pharmaceuticals or something in there.

translation.en: The reason I ask is because, before I moved back,
translation.es: El motivo por el que pregunto es porque antes de volver,

translation.en: one of the firms I was consulting for had this guy--
translation.es: fui consultor de una empresa que...

translation.en: Oh, Joe.
No, it’s true. He was-- Really--
translation.es: No, es verdad. Era... En serio...

translation.en: Really? “Consulting”?
You were in jail.
It was in the paper.
Your picture was in the paper.
translation.es: Tu foto estaba en el diario.

translation.en: “Slash Cop,” it said, which just is...
What happened?
Didn’t you read it?
I’m asking you.
I was very drunk. Um--
Coming home from a place downtown.
translation.es: ...y volvía a casa desde el centro.

translation.en: Apparently I bumped into him, the lawyer.
translation.es: Aparentemente me topé con él, el abogado.

translation.en: And, uh--
There was a fight, and I hurt him. Badly.
translation.es: Hubo una pelea y le hice daño. Mucho.

translation.en: - It said you had a knife. - I thought he was gonna--
translation.es: - Tenías un cuchillo. - Creí que iba...

translation.en: It was dark, and I- I- I, um--
If you knew...
Because I know what it means to need a second chance.
translation.es: Sé lo que significa necesitar una segunda oportunidad.

translation.en: And I didn’t know you when you did those things.
translation.es: Y no te conocí cuando hiciste esas cosas.

translation.en: I know you now.
- - Hello?
Didn’t wake your girl, did I?
I was hoping I would’ve heard some sort of “In Memoriam” item by now about our mutual patron.

translation.en: I fucking tried. Junior was there.
- Whoa. - Yeah, exactly.
I can’t get that close again.
If anything other than cancer happens to Manny, I’ll be the first one he comes after.

translation.en: Figure it out.
Put in some work instead of gettin’ your dick wet.

translation.en: I was working. She’s the nurse there.
translation.es: Estaba trabajando. Ella es su enfermera.

translation.en: - Oh. Good thinkin’. - Yeah. Except that won’t work either.
translation.es: - Bien pensado. - Sí. Pero no funcionará.

translation.en: - Why not? - It just... won’t.
There’s no access. Trust me.
All that matters is that there isn’t a case brought against you.
translation.es: Lo único que importa es que no haya un caso en tu contra.

translation.en: So if you can’t clip Manny, clip the mutant.

- Yeah. - Joseph Denton?
- Yeah. - This is Anthony Getman
translation.es: - ¿Joseph Denton? - Sí. Habla Anthony Getman de Bradley.

translation.en: with the Bradley Post- Release Program.
You have your office check- in and urinalysis appointment today.

Yes, sir. I’ll be right there.
Fuck.
- Hello? - It’s Joe.
- I need your help. - Who is it?
Joe.
- Oh, hey, man. Come on up. -
Seriously, Joe, it’s no problem.
Positive?
The, uh, reserves piss test randomly, so I, uh...

translation.en: stick to booze.
- You can keep the cup.  -
- Thanks, man. I owe ya. - No.

translation.en: Hey, Joe, can I ask you something straight up?
Sure.
Back then was there ever any, uh--
I don’t know--
any talk about what happened to Billy maybe wasn’t an accident?

translation.en: I mean,
we all know he was a lush, but falling asleep on the tracks?
translation.es: todos sabemos que era un borrachín, pero ¿dormirse en las vías?

translation.en: Wasn’t my case, but I knew the guys who drew it. They worked it right.
translation.es: No fue mi caso, pero sé que se hizo todo bien.

translation.en: Why, um...
Why now?
Phil Coakley called me. He wants me to come in.
translation.es: Phil Coakley me llamó. Quiere que vaya a verlo.

translation.en: Mm- hmm. He say why?
He said they’re gonna impanel a grand jury and, uh, reopen it as a homicide.
translation.es: Dijo que iban a elegir un gran jurado y reabrirlo como homicidio.

translation.en: Based on what?
“New information” is all he would say.
It’s like he wanted to dangle it in front of my face.
translation.es: Es como si quisiera tentarme con eso.

translation.en: Fuckin’ prick.
Whatever Phil says he’s got, it’s smoke. He’s fishing.
translation.es: Lo que Phil diga que tiene, es humo. Busca algo.

translation.en: He’s got a hard- on for the Vasseys. Always has.

translation.en: There was talk about Junior, maybe he’d been around the tracks that night.

translation.en: But they could never back it up. It was what it was.
translation.es: Pero nunca pudieron probarlo. Así fue.

translation.en: A shitty accident, like you said.
translation.es: Un accidente de mierda, como dijiste.

translation.en: I’m sorry, man.
I never liked Phil anyway.
I was glad when you fucked him up.
Thanks, man. All right.
Hey, buddy.
- Hey, fellas! - Hey, Dan!
Yeah, now he gets it.
Get it all out.
- Okay. -
Up you go. Come on.
This thing works pretty good, huh?
Now, I didn’t wake up in this mood.
I was thinking, “Don’t worry. My pal Joey will carry his water on this thing.”

This Caldwell grand jury is, uh, in motion after all.

translation.en: - I know. - Did I tell you time was short?

translation.en: I’ll just take my chances in court.

translation.en: Buddy, you know I wouldn’t be able to let you do that.
translation.es: Amigo, sabes que no te dejaré hacer eso.

translation.en: Then I’ll run.
Well, that either. Do I need to recharge your battery?
F- Fu-- I can’t do Manny. I can’t do Phil.
translation.es: No puedo matar a Manny. Ni a Phil.

translation.en: You name a third way or get the fuck out.
I just bought a new gas grill.
Stainless steel. Got an infrared system on it.
To be honest, I don’t even know what that means.

Now, you fix it before then, or I’ll assume that we’re at odds.

translation.en: Kelley’s.
Hey, it’s me.
Hey, hey, hey. How you feelin’ today?
Do you know, I was thinking maybe I’d want to talk to Toni.

So you know when she sees Dan then?
Or-- Or where?
Dan? I never mentioned Dan.
I was talking about Phil Coakley.
How else do you think that Frankenstein motherfucker’s getting any pussy?

English Garden Inn, off 68.
Same room or different room?
He had a retainer on number 27, on account of it’s a queen size.

translation.en: - Can you get him to see you again? - I don’t wanna see him.

Thousand dollars?
Cash. After.
I think I can do it.
Good boy. Which one?
Neither.

I can back him off. No grand jury, no Manny Vassey. It’s done.

Bradley’s most saintly public official. Solicitation, on tape.

I’m looking at it.
I’ll be goddamned.

but, still, blackmail’s messy, you ain’t careful.

It will be.

You seem different.

I don’t know.
Lighter.
Things are gonna work out.
Maybe they already have.
I’m gonna have a shower.
All right.
Yeah?

- - I’ll call you tonight!

Taurus is the car you’ve been waiting for.

See the new look Taurus at a dealership near you.

Police! Stay in your room!
Shit!
No.
Joe.
I gotta talk to you.
All right.
I read this while you were inside.
I didn’t know there was a name for it.

translation.es: Siempre supe, desde que eras pequeño...

translation.en: there was something in you.
And I didn’t do anything about it.

about my part in what happened to you.
translation.es: ...sobre mi papel en lo que te pasó.

I didn’t do anything.
I didn’t make you run with wild people.

For that I am truly sorry.

Give me the keys.
Dad...
Give me the keys.
Tomorrow morning.

Joe?

I will not have dirty money in my house.

Where did it come from? Where?
What’s the difference? I’m leaving! You get your wish!

- Take it easy, Joe. - Mom.
I’m going. Okay? I’m going.
But I need that bag.

So where is it? Please.
Please.
What the fuck?
You...
have been in touch this whole time?
The best thing that ever happened to those girls was to get away from their father.

You’ll never hate me as much as I hate myself!

When did you ever care how I felt?
That’s all I ever cared about! And I don’t hate you!
translation.es: ¡Es lo único que me importó! ¡Y no te odio!

translation.en: I hate what you’ve done to this family!
translation.es: ¡Odio lo que le hiciste a esta familia!

translation.en: - Where’s the fucking money? -
Joe! 911! Joe, call 911!
- Oh! - Call 911, Joe!
- Oh, Jesus Christ, Joe! - Aaah!
Dad?
Dad?
Who did it?
Junior Vassey or- or Dan Pleasant. I don’t know.
translation.es: Júnior Vassey o Dan Pleasant. No lo sé.

translation.en: Your friends.
You bring mayhem with you, Joe.
I fucked up.
Then what happened was...
I got behind with my bookie.
translation.es: ...que me atrasé con mi corredor de apuestas.

translation.en: It started slow, ya know, couple of Sundays of bad luck.
translation.es: Empezó lentamente, un par de domingos de mala suerte.

translation.en: Next thing I know, I’m underwater.
I kept thinking, “Aw, I’ll sort this out.”
“I’ll dig out from this.
My daughters...
when they look at me, when they look at my face, they’ll forgive me.”
translation.es: ...cuando me miren, cuando me vean a la cara, me perdonarán”.

translation.en: Me and another cop...
a guy named Dan...
we did whatever Manny said, and he said, “Do terrible things.”
translation.es: ...hacíamos todo lo que decía Manny, y él dijo: “Hagan cosas terribles”.

translation.en: Now it--
It’s happening all over again.
He’s gonna talk about all that now, Manny is, and when he does...
translation.es: Él hablará de todo eso, Manny lo hará, y cuando lo haga...

translation.en: that prosecutor’s gonna give me the death penalty.
translation.es: ...ese fiscal me dará la pena de muerte.

translation.en: Assuming Dan doesn’t kill me first.
translation.es: Suponiendo que Dan no me mate primero.

translation.en: You don’t know that.
You don’t.
We’re not defined by our pasts.
You’ve remade yourself. You’ve chosen to be a good man.
translation.es: Te rehiciste. Elegiste ser un buen hombre.

translation.en: It’s a choice. That’s all it is.
translation.es: Es una decisión. Eso es todo.

translation.en: In prison, uh, there was a chaplain.
translation.es: En la prisión, había un capellán.

translation.en: Chaplain Morris.
And he sat with me for-- for fuckin’ years.
translation.es: Y se sentó conmigo durante... durante años.

translation.en: I’m tellin’ ya, if someone tells you for that long that you can be forgiven...
translation.es: Te lo digo, si alguien te dice por tanto tiempo que pueden perdonarte...

translation.en: You’re the only one who made me feel like maybe he was right.
translation.es: Eres la única que me hizo sentir que quizás él tenía razón.

translation.en: He was.
I need money to run.
- Let’s go. - Hey, guys.
I’m gonna go.
Big time.
But...
you’re gonna see the playroom first.
Junior, you don’t have to do this. I-- I swear I’m gonna leave.
translation.es: Júnior, no tienes que hacer esto. Juro que me iré.

translation.en: What- Whatever Phil is gonna do with your Dad had--
translation.es: Lo que sea que Phil haga con tu papá...

translation.en: My dad?
My father... is dead.
He was a great man. A king.
translation.es: Era un gran hombre. Un rey.

translation.en: And...
Well, they’ll never be another one like him, right, fellas?
- Fuck yeah. - Hmm.
Don’t, don’t! No!
Your girlfriend isn’t the most competent nurse I’ve ever seen.
translation.es: Tu novia no es la enfermera más competente que haya visto.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, you sound like she did.
translation.es: Santo Dios, suenas como ella lo hizo.

translation.en: But don’t worry. You’ll see her again.
translation.es: No te preocupes. Volverás a verla.

translation.en: Where is she?
Out there.
We’re gonna go in there together, you and me.
translation.es: Tú y yo vamos a entrar juntos.

translation.en: We are gonna go down there and work it all out.
We got all day, don’t we?
There’s nothing to work out. Uh--
I didn’t do anything. It wasn’t me.
translation.es: Yo no hice nada. No fui yo.

translation.en: That’s not what she said.
translation.es: No es lo que ella dijo.

translation.en: We don’t have to do this. It wasn’t me.
translation.es: No tenemos que hacerlo. No fui yo.

translation.en: - All right, come on. - No. No! - - No. No. No, no, no!
Who the fuck is this?
I’ll kill you, Junior!
Die, motherfucker!
I see you, Junior! I see you back there, bitch!
translation.es: ¡Te veo, Júnior! ¡Te veo ahí atrás, maricón!

translation.en: There you go, Junior! There you go!
Get some!
Get some!
Now, Bill is my brother!
Suck my cock, you fuckin’ retard!
Fuck it.
Fuck, man.
Joe?
Hey, Joe.
You hold on, okay? You just hold on.
Scotty, you hear me?
Yeah, yeah, I hear you.
Good.
You’re gonna be fine.
- Getting you help. - Yeah?
’Cause...
you were like a brother to Billy.
That makes you like a brother to me, right?
translation.es: Eso te convierte en mi hermano.

translation.en: That’s right.
Except he didn’t fall on any fucking train tracks, did he?
translation.es: Solo que no se cayó en las putas vías del tren, ¿no?

translation.en: Not the way they said.
You... put him there.
That’s crazy, Scotty. Just--
We’re almost there, okay?
Junior... told you to do it.
translation.es: Júnior... te dijo que lo hicieras.

translation.en: And you did it.
I talked to Phil about it, you know?
- He’s not such a bad guy. - Did you--
Did you maybe take a shot at my house, Scotty?
translation.es: ¿Tú le disparaste a mi casa, Scotty?

translation.en: Yeah.
Sorry.
- - Yeah.
You slick motherfucker, you.
translation.es: Eres un hijo de puta escurridizo.

translation.en: Hey, Dan.
Thought you said your plan was “no bodies.”
translation.es: Creí que tu plan era “sin muertos”.

translation.en: But I ain’t complainin’. You do some work on his brakes or what?
translation.es: Pero no me quejo. ¿Le hiciste algo en los frenos?

translation.en: His what?
Phil’s car.
- Bitch, I knew it! -
Motherfucker.
Got into a smashup last night. Went up in smoke.
You did it. You’re free.
Now we’ll get started with the judge, get your girls back.
translation.es: Ahora hablaremos con el juez, por tus hijas.

translation.en: Yes, sir, a brand- new day, Joey. A brand- new day.
translation.es: Sí, señor, es un nuevo día, Joey. Un nuevo día.

translation.en: How is she?
She’s gonna live.
What are you doing?
I’m leaving.
What are you doing with that?
- You want it? -
- What are you doing with it? - I’m taking it to the girls.
translation.es: - ¿Qué harás? - Se lo llevaré a las niñas.

translation.en: - No, you’re not. - I’m not trying to buy them.
translation.es: - No es cierto. - No intento comprarlas.

translation.en: Just gonna give it to ’em.
translation.es: Solo se lo voy a dar.

translation.en: Most of it.
See them once more, and then I’ll just-- No, you’re not.
translation.es: - Las veré una vez más y luego... - No.

translation.en: You are going nowhere near those girls.
translation.es: No te acercarás a esas niñas.

translation.en: Money, no money, I don’t care.
translation.es: Con o sin dinero, no me importa.

translation.en: You will never be in proximity enough
that your damage and mayhem ever touches them, not even for a second.
translation.es: como para que tu daño y tu caos las toque, ni por un segundo.

translation.en: I promise this to you, Son.
This will not happen if I am alive.
translation.es: Eso no sucederá si estoy vivo.

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
I’m... sorry for everything.
No, you’re not listening.
I said it will not happen.
I said no.
Stop me.
